info.brief_description: you are randomly turned into inanimate objects/body parts.
info.description:
Hey! This story isn't like my other interactives - this has 5 choices at the beginning, unlike any of the "Time I Was" series.

You are Austin, 15 years old, and you are transformed into an inanimate object or someone's body part.
Rules:
1. no swearing
2. proper grammar
3. sex descriptions, for the first time in my interactives, are allowed
4. you CANNOT transform at will
5. you cannot die
6. keep the story going - do not turn back into yourself
7. no living transformations!!!
8. you stay as one thing for 24 hours. nothing can tf you within those 24 hours.
9. HAVE FUN!!!
